column5: http://www.highparknature.org/wiki/wiki.php?n=VolunteerOpportunities.HighParkNaturalEnvironmentCommittee    he Park Supervisor wants your input about fishing at Grenadier Pond and dangers to wildlife due to fishing line and hooks not disposed of properly. To share your opinion contact Jorge Ture and copy Councillor Doucette. More about Fish. A Fishing Ban on Grenadier Pond - summary of concerns Summary of Incidents to Wildlife at Grenadier Pond Related to Fishing: Conclusions and Recommendations Natural Heritage Reference Manual: Guidelines regarding responsibilities to protect an Area of Natural & Scientific Interest (ANSI) Our letter to TRCA about electrofishing and TRCA's response.
Only people to blame for this are the fishermen themselves.   Clean up your crap or lose your fishing spot.
This was posted to our fishing news 3 days ago. The info is there.
